name: Roblox+
description:
Adds features and notifiers made by WebGL3D to the Roblox website
This extension is not made by Roblox, and can not be used to play Roblox games.

Roblox+ is a free Google Chrome extension made by me (WebGL3D) that adds features to the Roblox.com website!

Some of the features include:
* Item notifier - get notified when a new item comes out or gets updated
* Avatar page filter bar
* Trade notifier
* Support dark theme on unsupported Roblox pages

There are over 30 features Roblox+ includes! For a full list of features see the Roblox+ Control Panel here: https://www.roblox.com/my/account?tab=rplus&rbxp=48103520
